name: IMFPA Training Foundation Trust

address: A-401 Dipti Classic,Suren Road, Andheri (East), Mumbai

briefDescription: IMFPA Training Foundation has been setup with the objective of providing basic and advanced training in the field of art to persons with disability. IMFPA Training Foundation will support and train any disabled person seeking to learn art or enhance their artistic skills. The Foundation will work closely with Indian Mouth and Foot Painting Artists and aid in training its artists and support them with the marketing and ssle of their artwork worldwide.

address: A-401 Dipti Classic,Suren Road, Andheri (East), Mumbai
